Name: Coconut Water
Ingredients: 37.5 ml Chilled water reduce if wet ice
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Review: Have you ever drunk from a fresh coconut in the Caribbean? Well, this is London's alcoholic equivalent.
History: Created in 2003 by yours truly in London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Coconut Water contains 227 calories
